name: Pocket Island
description:
~ This is an early test build, we are polishing the game as we speak and would love to hear what you think about it to make it better! ~

Be the god of your tiny island. For one day, every day...

Q, E - Rotate screen

WASD - Move

Scroll wheel - Zoom (zoom in fully to take pictures for your deity friends)

Drag Claude (the cloud) around by holding down the mouse cursor on it and dragging it around

1-5 quick select for your deity issued utility belt

*** Be careful when attempting to place out water for your villagers, accidental flooding is a common occurunce among deity.

Game by Agge & Johan Handin
